actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution relating to human rights in Cambodia.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Denounces the continuing disregard for human rights by the Cambodian government. Calls upon the President to: (1) take steps to persuade the Cambodian government to cease violating human rights; and (2) direct the Assistant Secretary of State for Human Rights and Humanitarian Affairs to document and present evidence of Cambodian human rights violations to the United Nations.

titles.title: A resolution relating to human rights in Cambodia.
